sugerencia_biografia: We want to meet you, we ask you to summarize your biography, not a very long story
indicativo_pais: Please indicate your country, and then the number
mostrar_patrocinador: Allow your contribution to be shown in each project
arrastra_click_subir: Drag, or click here to upload
agrega_imagen_proyecto: Add an image to the project
info_add_project_image: an image of you, your project or musical team
help_shorDescription_proyecto: Please, that the description is not extensive
help_nombre_proyecto: Please, we ask that the name is not very long
terminos_add_proyecto: Click here to indicate that you have read and agree to the terms presented in the Terms and Conditions agreement
no_hay_proyectos: You still have not any project
nigun_dato_tabla: No data available in this table
mostrando_registros_del_cero: Showing records from 0 to 0 of a total of 0 records
no_permisos: You do not have permission to access
tiempo_calificacion: Remember to rate this project before
sugerencia_compañia: If you wish, enter the name of the company that you represent
sugerencia_descripcion: Describe who you are, if you wish
comment_review_manager: Have a comment if you wish
hora_crear_primer_project: It's time to create your first project
proyecto_add_notificar: You must be aware, we will soon send information to your email about the status of your project
primer_proyecto_add_notificar: You have created your first project. You must be aware, we will soon send information to your email about the status of your project
deja_huella_musica: Show your talent and leave a mark. Start your own story with us.
sugerencia_country: Here select your country of birth
sugerencia_location: Here select the country where you are currently
seleccionarClasificacionText: First, the project must be qualified
categoria_de_proyecto: select the category of your project
select_solista: Choose, you are a soloist or group
solista_o: Select if you are a soloist or have a group
help_nombre_integrante: Write the name of the members
help_rol_integrante: Write what you do in the group (voice, guitar, piano, bass, etc).
ningun_proyect_estado: No project registered in this state
completa_perfil_artista: To add a project, complete your artist profile
integrantes_del_grupo_o_orquesta: Members of the group or orchestra
par_talento: Our platform is a showcase to show hidden talent.
par_apoyo: We provide a guide for the project to be successful.
par_comunidad: Management, sponsors and community in general willing to know and support talent.
par_rentabilidad: Opportunity for funding to further boost talent.
parrafo_que: Our platform aims to know and promote musical artists and comedians; We want to give them the opportunity to show their talent through a video which will be seen by our managements and sponsors who are interested in supporting and investing in the artists. And not only that, but also that there is collective financing, that is, a group of people financially supporting a project through a community that is willing to finance with small and medium contributions.
frase_nosotros: We are changing the way of making dreams possible.
parrafo_nosotros: In Caza talentos we want everyone to be successful, that is why we provide tools that allow your talent or project to be well presented.
parrafo2_nosotros: There are millions of people around the world who have the desire to be musical artists, however they do not have access to producers or managers, in other cases they do not have the economic means to pursue their career. The solution to this is Caza talentos.
ventajas_nosotros: Our competitive advantages are the connections and the experience we have in the music and comedy industry.
solo_registrate_graba_video: Just record and record your video, it's as simple as showing your talent in crowdfunding!
apoya_nuestros_proyectos: Support our artists or share your videos.
aqui_podras_info_artista: Here you can find information so you know how to be part of Bet for you, being an artist.
aqui_podras_info_patrocinador: Here you can find information so you know how to be part of Bet for you, being a sponsor.
ellos_han_recaudado: They have raised what they promised, and even more
ellos_son_quienes_apoyan: They are the ones who support us, and are willing to boost your career
email_reset_password_line: You are receiving this email because we received a password reset request for your account.
email_reset_password_line_2: If you did not request a password reset, no further action is required.
